welcome_fresh.title: Welcome to PaddiSense
welcome_fresh.description:
PaddiSense is a modular farm management platform for Home Assistant.

This wizard will:
1. Download PaddiSense from GitHub
2. Set up your farm identity
3. Install your selected modules
4. Configure Home Assistant

Click Submit to continue.
